name: Internship Adventure
description:
You work in a video game as a monster. Get yourself killed by Heroes while your boss yells at you. Discover the joy of working behind the scene - as an unpaid intern in the video game industry!

Link to the original Ludum Dare project page

How To Play

  • Arrow - Move
  • S - Skip dialogs
  • D - Play Dead
  • F - Fight
  • Space - Jump

Credits

  • Programmation & Game Design - Martin Bousquet (@bousquetm)
  • Art - Pascal Pouvereau & Roxanne Hinh
  • Music & Sound - Louis Leroux & Victor Guéroult
